REPORT.name: УЗ-Снятие
REPORT.description: Отчет по учетным записям - уменьшение баланса по дням --- Author: GameClass Software support@gameclass.ru
REPORT.code: select CONVERT(varchar(10),AccountsHistory.[moment],111) as [Дата], Accounts.[name] as [Имя учетной записи], SUM(AccountsHistory.[summa]) as [Сумма] from AccountsHistory inner join Accounts on (AccountsHistory.[idAccounts] = Accounts.[id]) where ([moment] >= %TIME-START%) and ([moment]<=%TIME-STOP%) and AccountsHistory.[what]=1 GROUP BY Accounts.[name], CONVERT(varchar(10),AccountsHistory.[moment],111) order by [Дата] desc
REPORT.author: NodaSoft
